pinyin: xuéxí lóng wén shì xuéxí hànzì wénhuà de hǎo fāngfǎ.

en: In delicious hot pot, people often add some "龙须菜" (seaweed).
pinyin: hǎo chī de huǒ guō lǐ, jīng cháng huì jiā rù yì xiē lóng xū cài

en: In the summer, eating a bowl of cold seaweed salad is a very refreshing experience.
pinyin: zài xià tiān, chī yì wǎn liáng bàn lóng xū cài shì yì zhǒng fēi cháng qīng shuǎng de tǐ yàn
